SEARCH
Package edu.asu.core.board

Class CheckerBoard

java.lang.Object
edu.asu.core.board.CheckerBoard
Direct Known Subclasses:
StandardCheckerBoard
public abstract class CheckerBoard extends Object
This abstract class serves as a base class for all types of checkerboards: 8x8 10x10 etc. it declares methods and attributes common to all types of checkerboards.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Martin Alemajoh

    • updateMove

      public abstract void updateMove(Position origin, Position destination)
      Updates a move made by a player. A move is represented by a start and end position Must be within the bound of the board
      Parameters:
      origin - the origin of the move
      destination - the destination of the move

    • updateCaptureMove

      public abstract void updateCaptureMove(Position captured)
      Updates a capture move. A capture move is a move attempted to capture opponents piece. It is represented by a start position capture piece position and destination
      Parameters:
      captured - the position of the piece to be captured

    • executeCaptureMove

      public abstract boolean executeCaptureMove(Move moves, Player player)
      Attempts to make a capture.
      Parameters:
      moves - Player's move
      player - Player
      Returns:
      a boolean representing the result of the execution. True if the execution was successful and false otherwise

    • isValidMove

      public abstract boolean isValidMove(Move moves, Player player)
      Validates if a move made by a player is valid
      Parameters:
      moves - Player's move
      player - Player
      Returns:
      a boolean representing the result of validation. True if the validation was successful and false otherwise

    • executeMove

      public abstract boolean executeMove(Move moves, Player player)
      Attempts to make a move
      Parameters:
      moves - Players move
      player - Player
      Returns:
      a boolean representing the result of execution. True if the execution was successful and false otherwise

    • isTie

      public abstract boolean isTie()
      Checks if there is a tie. A tie occurs when neither players can make a move nor a capture
      Returns:
      a boolean representing the result of the check. True if there is a tie and false otherwise

    • isBlocked

      public abstract boolean isBlocked()
      Checks if there is a block. A block occurs when a player can neither make a move nor a capture
      Returns:
      a boolean representing the result of the check. True if there is a block and false otherwise

    • won

      public abstract boolean won()
      Checks if there is a win. A win occurs when one player has zero pieces or one player is blocked
      Returns:
      a boolean representing the result of the check. True if there is a win and false otherwise

    • isValidForwardDiagonalMove

      public abstract boolean isValidForwardDiagonalMove(Position origin, Position destination, Player player)
      Validates if a move, based on the player is valid. If a player uses the top portion of the board they can only move downwards Similarly if a player uses the bottom portion of the board, they can only move upwards
      Parameters:
      origin - The origin of the move.
      destination - The destination of the move
      player - The player
      Returns:
      a boolean representing the validation. True if move is valid and false otherwise

    • isValidCaptureMove

      public abstract boolean isValidCaptureMove(Position origin, Position capturePiece, Position destination, Player player)
      Validates if a capture move is valid. A valid capture move must have a valid start position The capture piece, start and destination position must be valid diagonals destination must be empty.
      Parameters:
      origin - The origin of the move
      capturePiece - The position of the opponent's piece
      destination - The destination of the move
      player - The player
      Returns:
      a boolean representing the validation. True if capture is valid and false otherwise
